response.overview: Sinan, a young man, is faced with a terrible situation when he goes home one morning. Finding his parents brutally murdered, Sinan cannot make sense of what happened. The police think that his father went insane and killed his wife and then killed himself. Thinking that what happened is not normal, Sinan becomes more suspicious when his uncle, whom he has not seen for years, comes to his parents' funeral. Determined to learn the truth, Sinan decides to go to the village of Nazarkuyu, where his parents were born.
response.title: Cinni Nazar
